title: Tiger Woods monogram - who designed it?
content:
Does anyone know the designer behind the Tiger Woods monogram?

[http://www.karstadt.de/shop/\_im1/dbimages/sp/203/20328/2032803284\_g.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217232518/http:/www.karstadt.de/shop/_im1/dbimages/sp/203/20328/2032803284_g.jpg "http://www.karstadt.de/shop/\_im1/dbimages/sp/203/20328/2032803284\_g.jpg")

Cheers!

/Henriko

 [‹ InDesign Paragraph styles](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217232518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21244 "Go to previous forum topic") [Need help in designing Certificates ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071217232518/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21224 "Go to next forum topic")
author: henriko

comments.content: Likely someone in-house at Nike or a contract designer? I think it will be hard to track them down.
i think Josh Berger at Plazm did it.
